title: Google shuts down Shoelace experiment as local meetups disappear
content:
Google’s Area 120 incubator has shut down Shoelace, an event organizing app that it’s been trialing for the past year. The company said the service will be shutting down on May 12th in an email sent out to users. Now doesnt feel like the right time to continue investing in this project
